name: Airlock GYM - 4D
description: The airlock allows you to escape from the map by using your personal ship. Remember to carry with you the correct Cpt. keycard.

description: The airlock allows you to escape from the map by using your personal ship. Remember to carry with you the correct Cpt. keycard.

name: Escape Pod
description: Escape pod not only allows you to escape from the map, but also to board other ships. Be careful, this is a rather dangerous means of transportation due to the fragility of the capsule.

name: Hidden Stash
description: Hidden stashes may contain valuable items. On some maps it will be difficult to find them.

name: Vault
description: The vault may contain objects of great value, such as a gold bullion, one of the most precious goods. To open it, you will need a blowtorch.

name: Blocked access
description: In the blocked accesses you will be able to find valuable items such as jewelry boxes, war bonds or materials. To open them you will have to use a lockpick.

name: Blocked access
description: In the blocked accesses you will be able to find valuable items such as jewelry boxes, war bonds or materials. To open them you will have to use a lockpick.

name: Blocked resource box
description: In the locked resource boxes you will be able to find materials and if you are lucky more valuable items like the blowtorch. To open it you will have to use a lockpick.

name: Medic kit
description: In it you can find any consumable item, whether to increase health, reduce pain, or reduce fatigue. You can also find disinfectant, an item that will make it easier for you to make small first aid kits.

name: Ammo box
description: It can contain ammunition of all types of caliber, ammo boxes, and various types of gunpowder: normal gunpowder and hi-grade gunpowder.

name: Prisoners of War
description: 'The Central Empire’s forces have been captured and detained in some of the UA's penal colonies, find and examine their head of security prisoner manifest so they can be located'. Interact with the Prisoner Manifest for 3 seconds

name: Prison Break
description: The Penal Colony Armory is located on the third floor of the complex, accessible only through the central tower. It is the area that constitutes the lockers and the entrance to the vault, near the Main Security Office and the Control Post. Stay there for 2 minutes.

name: Dead body
description: In them you can find valuable objects, such as the penal colony token.

name: Depot
description: In it you can find valuables. It is located between two narrow corridors, near the library and the metal detectors. To open it you need to use the penal colony token.

name: Purse
description: In it you can find valuables such as coins: copper, silver and gold, war bonds, bank notes and rings: silver and gold.
